channel.title: PortForwarding!
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm having a problem with portforwarding. Its really pissing me off that I can create other private servers like for WoW and maplestory but I can't do this.
I don't exactly have a router and I tried using hamachi and the utorrent thing, but nothing is working. I'm using "Your server" for now but I still have an error whenever I try to log in. It always says error connecting to server no matter what I try. :( :(

item.title: PortForwarding!
item.dc:creator: @fivescape2200 fivescape2200
item.description:
@fivescape2200 wrote:

I’ll Tell you what to do… later when i get back from school in 5.7 hours so when i get bak ill help you.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Try looking on www.portforward.com. This section is for help pertaining to servers only.
